status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Upgraded to SDK 3.4.0, which comes with Alloy 1.5.

According to Alloy 1.5 release notes: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/blob/1_5_X/CHANGELOG.md

There are two data binding enhancements:

Support mixture of text and data binding notation when binding model attributes to XML attributes, for example, <Label text="first name: {model.first_name}"/>.

Support mapping multiple model attributes to a single XML attribute, for example, <Label text="{model.title} by {model.author}">.

I tested it with a collection, not a single model, like one of the examples here: http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/guide/Alloy_Data_Binding

But, it just doesn't work.
fields.summary: Alloy 1.5 - Data Binding Enhancement not working

comments.body: I'm going to resolve this as a duplicate because we already have ALOY-1236 for this same problem. Please watch that ticket.
